author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Alcatraz Art Seems Familiar...
body:
Thanks to LGA, I was able to see some rough sketches of Alcatraz Connection. 
And I was wondering if it was the same artist(or even director) of Walther P 
38, cus Lupin seems to have that little flat corner in his hair like he did 
in Walther. Does anyone know?
